title: Cher - You Better Sit Down Kids (60's)
description:
You Better Sit Down Kids [IMPORT]
Cher


These Imperial recordings have been reissued many times now. This European issue is great for its&#039; selections. Chers&#039; early recordings had a robust, moody quality that the young public identified with and they sound fresh today.The cover is a lovely 80s picture of Cher.The price and selections are right. My favorite cuts are "The Bells of Rhymney", and Chers&#039; haunting version of " Alfie". She does an energetic take on " Sunny", and improves Dylans&#039; "All I Really Want to do",moving up and down in register sounding like Sonny and herself in one cut!

Most recordings here are from the mid-60&#039;s.  For ALL CHER LOVERS OUT THERE!!
A MUST for your Cher collection!!

Track Listings

1. You Better Sit Down Kids
2. I Go to Sleep
3. Needles and Pins
4. Like a Rolling Stone
5. Young Girl (Une Enfante)
6. Blowin&#039; in the Wind
7. I Feel Like Something&#039;s in the Air
8. Sunny
9. Come and Stay With Me
10. Bells of Rhymney
11. Our Day Will Come
12. Mama (When My Dollies Have Babies)
13. Bang Bang (My Baby Shot Me Down)
14. Until It&#039;s Time for You to Go
15. It&#039;s Not Unusual
16. You Don&#039;t Have to Say You Love Me
17. Don&#039;t Think Twice, It&#039;s All Right
18. Cry Myself to Sleep
